item.title: Capital Bikeshare Ridership during COVID-19
item.description: The data world seems to be focused on making models using COVID-19 cases and deaths. However, since April 1st, I’ve been anxious to get the March 2020 Capital Bikeshare data to see how COVID-19 has affected the use of the District of Columbia’s public bikeshare system. I’ve come to terms with my emerging “foamer” status. Open data from Capital Bikeshare is available here. For this analysis, I compare March 2018, March 2019, and March 2020 data using trips that either start or end in the District of Columbia.
